Text: Going Under (1991 film):  is a 1991 comedy film starring Bill Pullman, Wendy Schaal, Chris Demetral, Tyrone Granderson Jones, Dennis Redfield, Lou Richards, Ernie Sabella, Elmarie Wendel, Ned Beatty, Robert Vaughn, and Roddy McDowall.

Text: Going Under (1991 film):  The film was directed by Mark W. Travis and written by Randolph Davis and Darryl Zarubica.
